backend/main.mo: Defines the ecommerce backend actor with product catalog, order types, authorization mixin, product queries, checkout, and user order retrieval.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old catalog and order structures to newer formats including updated size variants.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries for all major frontend files describing layout, components, pages, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, route tree, theme provider, cart provider, and renders the app shell.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout controls using Internet Identity with a dropdown for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth guard component that prompts unauthenticated users to log in before accessing protected content.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Shippin: Form component for collecting shipping name, phone, and address with validation and change handlers.
Reusable loading, empty, and error UI states with optional retry support.
Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with shop links, customer care links, and brand info.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with navigation, search, login, cart indicator, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/merch/CategoryFi: Sidebar filters for sorting and adjusting price range with reset support.
frontend/src/components/merch/CategoryTi: Grid of category tiles linking to category pages with image slices.
frontend/src/components/merch/ProductCar: Product card showing image, name, color, size info, and price with fallback image handling.
frontend/src/components/merch/ProductGal: Product image gallery with carousel controls, thumbnails, and fallback behavior.
frontend/src/components/merch/ProductGri: Responsive product grid with loading skeletons and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/merch/VariantSel: Size selection component mapping size codes to labels and handling user choice.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Categ: Category navigation links for desktop and mobile layouts.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useAuth.ts: Wraps identity and actor hooks to report auth state and provide login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/catalog/useCatalog.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch products by category, top products, and trending products via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/catalog/useProduct.ts: Fetches a single catalog product by ID using React Query and the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useCheckout.ts: Defines a checkout mutation that submits cart and shipping data, then invalidates order queries.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useOrders.ts: Loads the authenticated user’s orders using React Query and the current identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor, rebuilding it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth state, login/logout logic, and provides identity via React context.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom light/dark theme variables and base typography styles.
frontend/src/lib/catalog/categories.ts: Defines product category IDs and labels for catalog filtering.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart, allowing quantity changes, item removal, and navigation to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays products for a category with filtering, sorting, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles shipping form input, order submission, validation, and redirects on successful checkout.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero banner, category tiles, and top/trending product grids using catalog hooks and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details including order ID with navigation to orders or homepage.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Shows authenticated user's order history with statuses, totals, and fallback loading/error/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product info with gallery, variants, quantity, and add‑to‑cart logic using product and cart hooks.
frontend/src/state/cart/CartProvider.tsx: Provides cart context with item management, persistence via storage, and basic subtotal/item count tracking.
frontend/src/state/cart/cartStorage.ts: Handles loading, saving, and clearing cart data in localStorage with BigInt serialization.
frontend/src/state/cart/cartTypes.ts: Defines cart state and context type interfaces including item operations and computed values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing an e‑commerce app build, required product images, existing features, and known issues about missing product images.
